availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Louis Leo Moore (Clerk of McLean Circuit Ct.)

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, Circuit Court Clerk. Bardstown, Kentucky, native. Son of Alexander Moore and Francis Warren Moore. Married Elizabeth P. Landrum Moore. Calhoun, Kentucky, resident. Clerk of the McLean Circuit Court.

ab.bibl: Find A Grave, "Louis Leo Moore (1818-1897)," Memorial #88223665, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=88223665&ref=acom (accessed March 24, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean, Calhoun, p. 4.
